## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                          | Type     | Default                             |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `header` | `header`  | The section header string                            | `string` | `undefined`                         |

| `width`  | `width`   | One or multiple tailwindcss width utility class(es)  | `string` | `"max-w-[65rem] md:w-3/4 lg:w-2/3"` |
